Posts.Content: Oct 19, 2010 09:43PM DianaWolfson wrote: My docs told me that I shouldn't test my daughter until she was 18 or so. Before that, there's not much we can do.
Posts.Title: Concerned about my children, any advice would be appreciated! poeticrevolver eileen1955

Posts.Content: Oct 19, 2010 09:40PM DianaWolfson wrote: I am almost done reading the book Previvors and I have to say thank goodness theres a book like this. Finally! I'm not the most medical savvy person but I have to say it was written in a way that I totally understood. Some of those other books out there are too technical for me. The stories meant a lot to me and I really related to Madey and Lisa because they didn't test positive for BRCA. I learned so much. The website is www.previvors.com.   Bless you all!
Posts.Title: New Book for those who are High Risk bisous3 bisous3
